trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of controls on the form.
trans-unit.target: Representa una colección de controles en el formulario.

trans-unit.source: This class represents the collection of controls contained within a form.
trans-unit.target: Esta clase representa la colección de controles incluidos en un formulario.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlCollection.Add%2A> method to add a control to the form and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlCollection.Remove%2A> method to remove the control from the form.
trans-unit.target: Puede usar el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlCollection.Add%2A> método para agregar un control al formulario y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlCollection.Remove%2A> método para quitar el control del formulario.

trans-unit.source: The control collection represented by this class cannot be created without binding it to a specific form.
trans-unit.target: La colección de controles representada por esta clase no se puede crear sin enlazarlo a una forma específica.

trans-unit.source: As a result, you cannot create multiple instances of this control collection and interchange them with an active form to provide different control layouts.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, no puede crear varias instancias de esta colección de controles y con un formulario activo para proporcionar distintos diseños de control de intercambio de ellos.

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> control to the control collection of a form.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se agrega un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> control a la colección de controles de un formulario.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that a form has been created and named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo se requiere que un formulario se ha creado y denominado `Form1`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> to contain the controls added to the control collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> que contendrá los controles que se agreguen a la colección de controles.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: This constructor allows you to properly bind the control collection to the form to enable controls to be added to the form.
trans-unit.target: Este constructor permite enlazar correctamente la colección de controles al formulario para permitir que los controles que se agregan al formulario.

trans-unit.source: Because the control collection must be created with a specified form, you cannot create multiple collections of controls and interchange them with the form.
trans-unit.target: Dado que la colección de controles debe crearse con una forma específica, no puede crear varias colecciones de controles e intercambio ellos con el formulario.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to add to the form.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> que se agrega al formulario.

trans-unit.source: Adds a control to the form.
trans-unit.target: Agrega un control al formulario.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to add controls to the form.
trans-unit.target: Puede usar este método para agregar controles al formulario.

trans-unit.source: If you want to add a group of already created controls to the form, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Si desea agregar un grupo de controles ya creados al formulario, use la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> clase.

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> control to the control collection of a form.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se agrega un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> control a la colección de controles de un formulario.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that a form has been created and named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo se requiere que un formulario se ha creado y denominado `Form1`.

trans-unit.source: A multiple document interface (MDI) parent form cannot have controls added to it.
trans-unit.target: No se pueden agregar controles a un formulario MDI (interfaz de múltiples documentos) principal.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to remove from the form.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> que se va a quitar del formulario.

trans-unit.source: Removes a control from the form.
trans-unit.target: Quita un control del formulario.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to remove controls that you no longer need in your form.
trans-unit.target: Puede usar este método para quitar controles que ya no necesite en el formulario.

trans-unit.source: If you want to display a control after it is removed, you will need to add the control back to the form using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Si desea mostrar un control después de quitarlo, debe agregar el control al formulario, utilizando el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlCollection.Add%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To have a control remain on the form but not displayed, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: Para tener un control permanecen en el formulario, pero no aparece, use la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> propiedad del control.
